types.name: codecatalyst_createDevEnvironmentRepoType
types.description: Type of Git repository provided to the Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment create wizard

types.name: codecatalyst_updateDevEnvironmentLocationType
types.description: Locality of the Amazon CodeCatalyst update dev environment request (i.e., from the thin client or the local IDE instance)

types.name: userId
types.description: Opaque AWS ID identifier

types.name: codecatalyst_devEnvironmentWorkflowError
types.description: Workflow error name

types.name: codecatalyst_devEnvironmentWorkflowStep
types.description: Workflow step name

types.name: cwsprChatTriggerInteraction
types.description: Identifies the specific interaction that opens the chat panel

types.name: cwsprChatConversationId
types.description: Unique identifier for each conversation

types.name: cwsprChatUserIntent
types.description: Explict user intent associated with a chat message

types.name: cwsprChatHasCodeSnippet
types.description: true if user has selected code snippet, false otherwise.

types.name: cwsprChatProgrammingLanguage
types.description: Programming language associated with the message

types.name: cwsprChatConversationType
types.description: Identifies the type of conversation

types.name: cwsprChatMessageId
types.description: Unique identifier for each message in an conversation

types.name: cwsprChatActiveEditorTotalCharacters
types.description: Total number of characters in the active editor

types.name: cwsprChatActiveEditorImportCount
types.description: Number of import statements in the active editor

types.name: cwsprChatResponseCodeSnippetCount
types.description: Number of code snippets in response

types.name: cwsprChatResponseCode
types.description: HTTP response code for message API invocation

types.name: cwsprChatSourceLinkCount
types.description: Number of links in response

types.name: cwsprChatReferencesCount
types.description: Number of references in response

types.name: cwsprChatFollowUpCount
types.description: Number of follow ups in response

types.name: cwsprChatTimeToFirstChunk
types.description: Time taken in ms to get back the first chunk

types.name: cwsprChatTimeBetweenChunks
types.description: Time (list of int) taken in ms between chunks

types.name: cwsprChatFullResponseLatency
types.description: Time taken to get the full response in ms

types.name: cwsprChatResponseLength
types.description: Number of characters in response

types.name: cwsprChatRequestLength
types.description: Number of characters in request

types.name: cwsprChatInteractionType
types.description: Indicates the specific interaction type with a message in a conversation

types.name: cwsprChatInteractionTarget
types.description: Identifies the entity within the message that user interacts with.

types.name: cwsprChatAcceptedCharactersLength
types.description: Count of code characters copied to the editor

types.name: cwsprChatHasReference
types.description: True if the code snippet that user interacts with has a reference.

types.name: cwsprChatModificationPercentage
types.description: Percentage of characters edited by user after copying/inserting code from a message

types.name: cwsprChatCommandType
types.description: Type of chat command (/command) executed

types.name: cwsprChatCommandName
types.description: Type of chat command name executed

types.name: featureId
types.description: The id of the feature the user is interacting in.

metrics.name: aws_openLocalTerminal
metrics.description: Open local terminal with aws connection injected

metrics.name: codecatalyst_createDevEnvironment
metrics.description: Create an Amazon CodeCatalyst Dev Environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_updateDevEnvironmentSettings
metrics.description: Update properties of a Amazon CodeCatalyst Dev Environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_updateDevfile
metrics.description: Trigger a devfile update on a Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_localClone
metrics.description: Clone a Amazon CodeCatalyst code repository locally

metrics.name: codecatalyst_connect
metrics.description: Connect to a Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_devEnvironmentWorkflowStatistic
metrics.description: Workflow statistic for connecting to a dev environment

metrics.name: amazonq_openChat
metrics.description: When user opens CWSPR chat panel

metrics.name: amazonq_enterFocusChat
metrics.description: When chat panel comes into focus

metrics.name: amazonq_exitFocusChat
metrics.description: When chat panel goes out of focus

metrics.name: amazonq_startConversation
metrics.description: When user starts a new conversation

metrics.name: amazonq_addMessage
metrics.description: When a message is added to the conversation

metrics.name: amazonq_messageResponseError
metrics.description: When an error has occured in response to a prompt

metrics.name: amazonq_interactWithMessage
metrics.description: When a user interacts with a message in the conversation

metrics.name: amazonq_modifyCode
metrics.description: Percentage of code modified by the user after copying/inserting code from a message

metrics.name: amazonq_enterFocusConversation
metrics.description: When a conversation comes into focus

metrics.name: amazonq_exitFocusConversation
metrics.description: When a conversation goes out of focus

metrics.name: amazonq_runCommand
metrics.description: When a chat command is executed
